articles.title: Irrfan's son Babil thanks his fans in moving note: My vocabulary is dizzy. I love you - India Today
articles.description: Irrfan's son Babil thanked the actor's fans in a moving Insta story. Irrfan died yesterday (April 29) at 11.11 am.
articles.content:
Irrfan died on Wednesday (April 29) at the age of 53 in Mumbai. He was admitted to Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital due to a colon infection. Irrfan took his last breath at 11.11 am.

articles.title: Rishi Kapoor, Bollywood Leading Man From a Film Dynasty, Dies at 67 - The New York Times
articles.description: He was one of India’s best-known actors for decades, and was hailed by Prime Minister Narendra Modi as “multifaceted, endearing and lively.”
articles.content:
Rishi Kapoor, a widely popular film actor from one of Bollywoods most celebrated families, died on Thursday in Mumbai. He was 67.
